response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand its worth to you stands at $1,200,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a price of $1,150,000. This is a special offer considering the exceptional quality and significance of the product. Please let me know if this proposition aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 1150000}
